column2: "I've found that with a party supporting you, you can take on much bigger fights than you could handle alone."
"But since there's so many people, each person has much less individual freedom. Won't that affect our rank?"
"So I've been wondering if a party's behaviour changes when they're trying to get a good rank."
"...Senpai, if it's not too much of a bother, could you show me how you do it?"
